text: "El Toro Relajo" () is a song by American singer Selena. It was the fourth single released from Dreaming of You (1995) in the United States. It became the second single released for Mexico. The song was originally recorded for the Don Juan DeMarco movie soundtrack. Selena played a mariachi singer in that movie. == Covers == *Linda Ronstadt == Charts == Chart (1995) Peak position US Billboard Hot Latin Tracks 24 US Billboard Latin Regional Mexican Airplay 14 == References == Category:Selena songs Category:1995 songs Category:Songs in Spanish
title: El Toro Relajo
